item.title: Bollards damaged / missing, 24th June
item.description:
Grass verge on junction of Post Office Lane/ Stockwell Lane. There were originally 4 bollards on this verge, they have now all been damaged or completely knocked down. Please replace.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Besford Road, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
